These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

column1: Do you want to let members view marketplaces? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members view marketplace? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow marketplaces to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow marketplace to be viewed.

column1: Yes, allow viewing of all marketplaces, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow viewing of all marketplace, even private ones.

column1: Do you want to let members edit marketplaces? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members edit marketplace? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to edit their marketplaces.
column2: No, do not allow members to edit their marketplace.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit their own marketplaces.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit their own marketplace.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit all marketplaces.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit all marketplace.

column1: Do you want to let members delete marketplaces? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members delete marketplace items? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to delete their marketplaces.
column2: No, do not allow members to delete their marketplace items.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete their own marketplaces.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete their own marketplace items.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete all marketplaces.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete all marketplace items.
Yes, allow creation of marketplace items.

column1: No, do not allow marketplaces to be created.
column2: No, do not allow marketplace to be created.

column1: Do you want to let members upload photos to a marketplace listing? If set to no, the option to upload photos will not appear.
column2: Do you want to let members upload photos to a marketplace listing? If set to no, the option to upload photos will not appear.

column1: Yes, allow photo uploading to marketplaces.
column2: Yes, allow photo uploading to marketplace.

column1: No, do not allow photo uploading.
column2: No, do not allow photo uploading.

Do you want to let members create marketplace items? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view marketplace, but only want certain levels to be able to create marketplace items.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their marketplace listings. These options appear on your members' "Add Listings" and "Edit Entry" pages. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view marketplace.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their listings. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post comments on listings.

column1: Enter the maximum number of allowed marketplaces. The field must contain an integer between 1 and 999.
column2: Enter the maximum number of allowed marketplace. The field must contain an integer between 1 and 999.

column1: These settings affect all members in your community.
column2: These settings affect all members in your community.

Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Blogs, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

column1: Yes, the public can view marketplaces unless they are made private.
column2: Yes, the public can view marketplace items unless they are made private.

column1: No, the public cannot view marketplaces.
column2: No, the public cannot view marketplace.
